The loan for which she applied will help her to increase her production, through buying the present season's production to prepare the foods for the other seasons in which they are not available, and selling them at good prices. She is well known in her region with the good quality of products she sells, in addition to the special competitive prices she sets. She hopes to keep increasing her production and expanding her work to open a wide shop in the future.

Amal is pictured on the far right.

Samira is the second from the left. She is a 54-year-old married woman and mother of two. She has worked in handmade souvenirs for ten years. The loan requested will be invested in preparing for her daughter's expected baby needs.

Safaa is the second from the right. She is a 19-year-old single woman who works as a cashier in a restaurant to pay for her university needs. Today Safaa's requested loan will be used to pay her university fees.

Fairouz is a 37-year-old married woman who has worked in the handmade goods business for five years. The loan requested will be invested in her expected baby preparations.

loans.use: to buy the present season's production and prepare for the other seasons where the foods are not available

loans.name: Miguel Estuardo

texts.es:
MIGUEL  tiene 36 años de edad es soletro tiene un hijo, vive en casa con los padres en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

Miguel se dedica a realizar caramelos tradicionales cómo colaciones, canguil de dulce, habas fritas. Solicita el crédito para comprar maní, canguil, azúcar, colorantes, panela, canela, gelatina. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que le hace falta para trabajar. Las compras las realizará en Chimbo. 

El sueño a pesar de la edad es poder terminar de estudiar. Enfrenta desafío cómo la competencia y la mala salud. En el tiempo libre le gusta leer la biblia o libros interesantes.
texts.en:
Miguel is 36 years old and single. He has one child and lives at his parents' house in Chimbo, within the province of Bolívar. 

Miguel makes a living making traditional candies including "colaciones" (a sugar based candy), candied popcorn, fried fava beans. He is requesting this loan to buy peanuts, popcorn, sugar, colorings, brown sugar, cinnamon and gelatin. 

With the help of this loan he will be able to buy what he lacks in order to work. He will make his purchases within Chimbo. 

Despite his age, Miguel's dream is to finish his studies. He faces challenges of competition and poor health. In his free time he likes to read the Bible and other interesting books.

loans.use: to buy peanuts, popcorn, sugar, colorings, brown sugar, cinnamon and gelatin.

loans.name: Whilintons

texts.es:
Whilntons, de 36 años es un hombre soltero y responsable. Vive en compañía de sus padres en la casa que compraron juntos hace 2 años. Desde hace 4 años adquirió un ómnibus, “Compré el carro con mucho esfuerzo ya que quise tener mi propio negocio”, afirma. Es así que incursionó en el trasporte público cubriendo algunas rutas de la zona. Durante este tiempo obtuvo buenos ingresos, gracias al aumento de población. Ahora desea mantener a su auto en buenas condiciones para no tener problemas durante el viaje, aunque es en zona urbana, desea tener a sus clientes seguros para que puedan confiar en él. Su deseo a largo plazo es tener su propia empresa de trasportes, comprar más carros y ser uno de los mejores.  
Éste es su primer crédito con KIVA y agradece al apoyo de todos ustedes, ya que obtendrá el préstamo que necesita para lograr sus objetivos , además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Whilintons, invertirá los S/.500 soles en el mantenimiento de su vehículo.
texts.en:
Whilintons is 36 years of age and single. He is a responsible man, and lives with his parents in the house they bought together two years ago. Four years ago he bought a minibus, and says “I bought the bus after a lot of effort, as I wanted to have my own business”. This is how he started working in public transportation, covering a number of routes in the area. During this time he has obtained a good income, thanks to the rise in the local population. 

Whilintons now wants to keep his vehicle in good condition so that he has no problems during his journeys, even though they take him through urban areas. He wants to keep his customers safe, so that they can trust him. In the long term he wants to have his own transportation company, buy more vehicles, and be one of the best in his field. 

This is Whilintons’ first loan from Kiva. He thanks you all for your help, as he will obtain the loan he needs to meet his goals. He also promises to repay his loan installments on time. He plans to invest the 500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles he receives in carrying out maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance on his vehicle

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
This is Mary Ann, 47, a resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Rodrigo, and a mother to her children. By the grace of God, she has managed to support her children's schooling. She is working hard continually, to provide income for their everyday expenses.  

Mary Ann oversees the operations of their jeepney (see footnote) transportation business. She has one jeepney unit (14-16 person capacity), for which she charges boundary (a fixed amount of money) each day. Her regular passengers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 1,000 every day.

To help her continue the operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 19,000 loan. She will use the loan to pay for the maintenance of her jeepney unit and to buy spare parts. She expects a boost in her business income, as she expands her business.  

Mary Ann hopes to have more jeepneys, and dreams of living happily. She meets with her co-fellowship members* every week, to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

-Curiously, Jeepneys have purely American origins. They were first used by American soldiers helping the Philippines throw off the invading Japanese. Filipino ingenuity, however, managed to see this vehicle as an opportunity to earn, and modified the Jeep into a 20-seater jeepney, open enough to provide adequate ventilation, sturdy for every day travel, and cheap enough to buy and maintain. Now, the jeepneys are one of the things that makes the Philippines truly Philippines.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for spare parts and maintenance of the jeepney unit.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a married woman; she has three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She has operated a computer bureau business. She faces stiff competition in her business. With the 50,000 KES, she wants to purchase a photocopying machine. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a photocopying machine.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is 50 years old and lives in Khashuri district with his retired mother. David requested loans from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up but without any success. His loan request was rejected each time because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. 
David is an artisan who makes steel doors for private orders in his own workshop. Additional income comes from David’s mother’s monthly pension.
David requested a loan from Credo to start up a family business. David has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor people, who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With his credit, David will start trading with cement. He will buy cement bags at wholesale prices from the cement factory in Kaspi district and sell the bags with the prices marked up at the local market in Khashuri. This new business will give David an opportunity to earn additional income for the family and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: To start a retail business selling cement.

loans.name: Clement

texts.en:
Clement is 32 years old, married to Maureen, and the father of four children aged 10, 8, 6 and 4 years. He has been in the motorcycle transport business in Bomet town and its outskirts for the last four years, earning a monthly income of 15,000 KES.

Clement learnt about Kenya Agency for Development of Enterprise and Technology (KADET), a partner of World Vision International, from his colleagues in the industry, who have already been funded by KADET Ltd. He is servicing his third loan of 50,000 KES which he has added to his savings to purchase his own motorcycle.

He will use the proceeds to meet the family's basic needs. His dream is to see his children attain high levels of learning.

loans.use: to add to his savings in order to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine is a teacher with many years of experience teaching in the local school. She lives with her husband, daughter, son and mother-in-law. Narine's son Gurgen (in the photo) is 23 years old and studies at Public Administration Academy of the Republic of Armenia, where he is in the second course. 
Narine's salary allows her to cover her household costs, but is not enough to save for Gurgen's education.
She has applied for this loan to pay for her son's university tuition. The loan is very important for Narine and her son. Gurgen dreams of becoming a lawyer after graduation and having a job with enough salary to be financially independent. This loan is important for him to continue his education and make his dream come true.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 30 years old and lives in Kakamega county, which is found in the western part of Kenya, She is married to Luvasi who is a businessman in the same location. She helps support her husband and two children, ages 6 and 2.

She sells cereals, a business she started three years ago, and makes a monthly income of KES 30,000. She has applied for her third loan with KADET LTD, which she will use to add to her stock of maize, beans, green grams (mung beans) and millet for resale. She will use the anticipated profit to plow back into the business.

Her dreams is to become a supplier and to give her children the best education in their lives.

loans.use: To purchase maize, green grams (mung beans) and millet.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy materials to make and sell griddles

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es: José de 36 años de edad vive junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos de 8 y 6 años en casa propia, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz,  pipianes y fruta como melón y sandia , tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y eso le  ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, cuando sus cosechas ya estan listas las almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografia para luego salir a comercializarlas en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el buen servicio; el necesita invertir por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar semillas de maíz, frijol, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Jose  tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica
texts.en:
Jose is 36 years old and lives with his wife and their two children, aged 8 and 6 years, in their own home. 

He works growing corn, pumpkins and fruit such as melon and watermelon. He has worked in agriculture for several years and he has gained a lot of experience, which means he gets the best crops. When his crops are ready, he stores them in barns as you can see in the photograph, and later goes and sells them in the surrounding areas of the community. He already has lots of customers who prefer his crops because of the quality, good prices and above all for the good service. 

He needs to invest so has applied for a loan to buy seeds for corn, beans, insecticide, herbicide, e.t.c. Jose has good payment references from his acquaintances, and is very responsible. He guarantees that he will be able to pay the debt back within the prescribed period and also hopes to bring financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy seeds for corn, beans, insecticide, herbicide, e.t.c.

loans.name: Angel Ramiro

texts.es:
ANGEL tiene 59 años de edad es casado no tiene hijos, vive en casa de unos familiares en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

Angel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, trigo. Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, urea, insecticidas, semillas. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que le hace falta para trabajar en los terrenos. 

El sueño es cumplir con el trabajo. los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia y el mal clima. En el tiempo libre le gusta reunirce con la familia.
texts.en:
Angel is 59, married, has no children, and lives with relatives in the Chimbo province of Bolivar. 

Angel works in agriculture planting corn and wheat. He is requesting the loan to buy fertilizer, urea, insecticide and seeds.

With the help of the loan, he will be able to purchase what he needs to work the land.

His dream is to accomplish the work. The challenges he faces are competition and bad weather. In his spare time he enjoys being with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, urea, insecticide and seeds.

loans.name: Clara

texts.en:
Clarita is a Kubo Financiero client. This is her story:

I am 66 years old and have been a widow for the last 21 years. I have 4 grown up sons that are independent and I live alone, I have a house. I work selling shoes door to door. I keep working because I like it to be active, feel useful and fortunately have many recurring clients. I consider myself credit worthy, because I always pay on time.

I need the loan to buy more shoes to because I have many orders. Usually, I have some savings but at the moment I am a little short on cash to buy more inventory.

I usually buy the shoes in the market of San Mateo Atenco on Sundays, the shoes are of good quality and they are made of leather. I sell to my clients both on credit or cash. I have been selling shoes for the last five years. Previously I worked for many years on an hotel, but I retired and then decided to keep working. I like what I do, because it gives the opportunity to meet lots of people and have fun.

My biggest accomplishment has been able to raise my children and provide them with some stability.

loans.use: To buy shoes, fulfill orders from her clients and get more recommendations.

loans.name: Yadhira Lucero

texts.en:
Yadhira is a Kubo Financiero client. This is her story:

My name is Yadhira, I am a 25 year old single mother. I live in a rental house with Rosa Jimena, my 7 year old daughter. She is my growth engine. I work hard to provide her with some stability and send give her a good education, I never went to school, I had to work to support my family.

I started my business five years ago, I cook and sell mexican food snacks such as quesadillas and gorditas.  I have to be a good manager because from this small business, I cover all the family expenses.

I want a loan to buy inputs for my restaurant and refurbish my food stall.

loans.use: To buy some inputs and refurbished her food stall.

loans.name: Giulbaiaz

texts.en:
Giulbaiaz is 56 years old. She lives in Gardabani district with her daughter and three grandchildren who are 3, 4 and 6 years old. Giulbaiaz had requested for a loan from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. Her loan requests were rejected every time because of her family's low income and poor living conditions.

Giulbaiaz’s son-in-law is works Turkey and sends money transfers to support the family. This is the only source of the income for them.

Giulbaiaz has requested a loan from Credo to start a family business. She has been granted a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor people, who do not have access to credit products. These rural poor people are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With her credit Giulbaiaz will cultivate the land and purchase greens seeds. She has a small plot of agricultural land and plans to use it to earn additional income for the family. Giulbaiaz will rent a tractor to cultivate the land. After cultivation is done, she will plant the seeds and will later have a good harvest. The harvested greens will be sold at the local market. As the transfers she receives are rarely enough to cover the food expenses for the family, with the new business Giulbaiaz will be able to improve their income and provide better living conditions for her grandchildren.

loans.use: to cultivate the land and purchase greens seeds.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.en: Gregoria is a vegetable farmer from Bohol, Philippines. She has been engaged in vegetable farming for more than 20 years now. This is the source of her income. Gregoria is asking for a loan to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides. Through this loan, she will be able to improve her farm as well as her harvest. In the future, Gregoria dreams of making her business sustainable and a success.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides.

loans.name: Tony

texts.en:
Tony is engaged in the farming business. In particular, he grows palay (unhusked rice) in his 1.5 hectare rice field. He has been doing this kind of business for three years. Tony is a young farmer. He is married and has one child. His main goal in life is to have a stable source of income so that he can provide a quality education for his child and someday improve his family's way of living.

Tony would like to purchase farm supplies such as insecticides, sacks of seedlings and eight sacks of fertilizer for his farming business. However, he lacks capital. This is the reason why he would like to borrow a loan of 50,000 PHP from Kiva lenders. He knows that this amount will help him a lot in improving his production of rice crops and in obtaining a better income. Tony hopes and prays that his farming business will continue to improve so that he can attain his goals in life.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, bags of seedlings, and eight sacks of fertilizer for his farming business.

loans.name: Gbotema Business Women Group

texts.en:
Messie is the featured leader of this group of entrepreneurs. She was born in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone, 40 years ago. She is married to a businessman and the couple has four children: one is attending primary school, two are in secondary school and one is in college. Messie has been in business for many years now. She has been selling groundnuts (peanuts).

Together, they are applying for a loan of 4,000,000 leones (SLL) from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales and, consequently, improve their living conditions.

Messie will use her share of the loan (800,000 SLL) to expand her business. She will buy groundnuts wholesale to add to her current ones.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts wholesale to add to her current ones

loans.name: Salem

texts.en:
Salem is a 41-year-old Iraqi who is married and has two children. He works hard to provide for his family's needs.
Salam owns a blacksmith’s shop and specializes in making furniture, doors and windows. This business has run in his family for generations. He helped his father since childhood with all the necessary work. After gaining all the needed experience, he established his own business in 2003. Salam is well-known in the surrounding area and has gained an excellent reputation.
Salam is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to buy a motor generator and to increase his inventories in order to improve his production. Salam believes that this loan will positively improve his business and will effectively increase his profits and he will be able to provide better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator and to increase his inventories

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT), a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone is very pleased to present to you Mohamed, a businessman in Kenema city who has come to SMT/Kiva lenders to request a loan of SLL 5,000,000.00 in order to invest in his businesses. 

Mohamed sells electronics and has been doing business for many years now. Mohamed is single with no children. He has requested this loan in order to buy items like DVDs, mobile phones, cassette recorders, TVs, memory cards, etc. to add to his shop.

loans.use: to buy items like DVDs, mobile phones, cassette recorders, TVs, memory cards, etc. to add to his shop

loans.name: Naiyanoi

texts.en:
Naiyanoi is 51 years old, married and supports a family of 10 members. She is a mixed farmer, and she has been in the business for the last eight years. Her monthly income is 9,000 Kenyan shillings (KES).

Naiyanoi is currently servicing her third loan from KADET Ltd. of 30,000 KES that will help her to prepare the land and get planting seedlings. She plans to use the anticipated profits to diversify into livestock farming. Her future dream is to improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Mouhannad

texts.en:
Mouhannad is an Iraqi client, who is 34 years old, married, and has two children.
 
Mouhannad owns a blacksmith’s shop. He specializes in making doors and windows. He has been in this field since his childhood, when he used to help his father, who in his turn, also owned a blacksmith’s shop. In 2005, Mouhannad established his own business, and now he has an employee hired. He gained an excellent reputation and is well-known in his surrounding area, thanks to his clean work and the maximum satisfaction that he offers for his clients.

Mouhannad is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD, which he will use to buy a motor generator, to increase his production. He believes that through this loan, he will improve his business and increase his revenues, and he will be able to provide for all of his family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator, to increase his production

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is married and she lives in her house that has electricity but not piped water.  Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for her three children.

For the past year, she has operated a food vending business, selling consumables like flat bread, rice and beans.  She indicates that theft and competition are the major challenge she faces in this business. 

She is requesting a loan of 30,000 KES to increase her business.  She will purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tealeaves and cooking oil, which she uses to prepare the food she sells. 

She dreams of expanding to a cafe in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, maize flour, tealeaves and cooking oil.

loans.name: Santos Nasario

texts.es: El Sr. Santos es casado, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad y no dependen de él, han culminado sus estudios que con mucho esfuerzo les ha dado don Santos con su humilde trabajo como guarda de seguridad en una institución estatal y con la ayuda de su esposa quien es docente de un colegio. Solicita este crédito para la construcción de un anexo en la parte trasera de su vivienda que pretende con el tiempo convertirlo en una habitación, así ha venido utilizando los financiamientos en construcción y mejoras de su vivienda, de esta manera darle mayor calidad de vida a su familia por quienes lucha a diario.
texts.en:
Santos is married.  His children are grown and don't depend on him.  They have finished their studies that Santos has given them with great effort, with his humble job as a security guard at a state institution, and with the help of his wife, who is a school teacher.

He is applying for this loan for the construction of an addition to the back part of his house that, in time, he would like to convert into a bedroom.  He has thus been using the loans for construction and improvements to his house in order to give a better quality of life to his family, for whom he struggles daily.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron and cinder blocks.

loans.name: Adriana María

texts.es:
Adriana es una mujer de 46 años de edad y con  grandes proyecciones en la vida. Desde joven ha laborado en el campo por lo cual ha despertado un gran amor por la naturaleza y los animales; animales que se han constituido en su actividad comercial y en la generación de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. En la actualidad se dedica a la cría de cerdos, actividad que desea alternar con la producción de pollos, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la adecuación y mejoramiento de corrales, galpones y compra de animales en diferentes edades para asegurar la producción de huevos y carne en todos los meses del año.
Gracias a esta inversión, Adriana iniciará con su proyecto de crear su microempresa y podrá aumentar sus ingresos y optimizar los espacios y recursos naturales con los que cuenta en su vereda.
texts.en:
Adriana is a 46 year old woman with great life ambitions. Since she was very young she has worked in the fields, which has awakened in her a great love for nature and animals. Raising animals has been her commercial activity and she has generated earnings from this work to provide sustenance to her family. Currently she makes a living raising pigs, an activity that she hopes to alternate with raising chickens. For this reason she is requesting a loan that she will invest in making improvements to her pens, sheds and to purchase animals of various ages to ensure the production of eggs and meat during all times of the year. 

Thanks to this investment, Adriana will begin with her project of creating a micro-enterprise and will be able to increase her earnings and optimize her space and natural resources that she has in front of her home.

loans.use: to make improvements to her pens and sheds and to purchase chickens.

loans.name: Carmen Elena

texts.es:
CARMEN tiene 38 años de edad es casada tiene un hijo, vive con el esposo y el hijo en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

Carmen se dedica al comercio de granos secos. Solicita el crédito para comprar una lavadora. Con la ayuda del crédtito podra comprar lo que le hace falta en la casa para lavar la ropa. Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Guaranda. Los desafíos a los que s e enfrenta es luchar contra cualquier problema.
En el tiempo libre le gusta  reunirce con la familia.
texts.en:
Carmen, age 38, is married and has one child.  She lives with her husband and child in Chimbo in the Bolívar province.

Carmen sells dried grains.  She is requesting the loan to buy a washer.  With the help of the loan, she will be able to buy what she needs for her house in order to wash the clothes.  She will make her purchases in the city of Guaranda.  The challenges she faces are struggling against any problems.

In her free time she likes to get together with the family.

loans.use: to buy a washer.

loans.name: Las Maravillas Group

texts.es:
Adolfo tiene 19 años de edad él pertenece a un grupo de personas que piden créditos los cuales pagan semanalmente, Adolfo estudia en el tecnológico de su población, es soltero y el tiene un negocio de venta de perfumes. Vende los perfumes en su escuela a sus compañeros y a sus maestros; dice que comenzó este negocio para ayudar a sus mamá a pagar parte de sus estudios ya que le piden muchos trabajos y les piden material y así ayudaría a su mamá, dice que le va bien porque ya le hacen encargos sus clientes y eso lo motiva a salir adelante, él va y  los compra en la ciudad de México en diferentes tiendas donde le dan precios más bajos para el poderle ganar algo, dice que otros se los mandan de Estados Unidos sus familiares ya que allá los dan un poco mas económicos y eso le favorece a él. Los perfumes los vende de contado o en pagos para que a sus clientes no se les haga pesado y así no le queden mal. 
Está pidiendo un crédito para surtir perfumes para dama y caballero ya  que tiene varios pedidos pendientes y así con lo que saque de las ganancias podrá ayudarse con los gastos de su escuela. 
Las demás integrantes del grupo se llaman Silvia, Leshlye, Estela, María Guadalupe, Nora Angélica, Reyna y Josefina ellos invertirán en sus negocios en una papelería, compra de insumos para vender antojitos mexicanos, en la compra de ropa usada para su venta, para la compra de cosméticos y zapatos por catalogo y en la compra de maíz y varios insumos para elaborar tortillas.
texts.en:
Adolfo, 19, belongs to a group of people that requests loans which are re-payed weekly. Adolfo studies in his town's technical school, is single and has a business selling perfumes. He sells them in his school, to his classmates and teachers; He says that he began this business to help his mother pay for a portion of his studies. Since the school asks him for a lot of work and material, this would help his mother. 

He says it is going well for him because his clients already put in orders with him and this motivates him to move forward. He goes and buys them in Mexico City in different stores where they give him lower prices so that he is able to make some profit. He says that some of them are sent to him by his relatives in the United States because they are sold at slightly lower prices there, and that gives him another advantage. He sells his perfumes in cash or in payments so that it's not too hard for his clients and that way his perfumes don't lose their appeal.

He is requesting a loan in order to stock up on men's and women's perfumes since he has various pending orders, and with what he makes from his sales he will be able to help with school expenses.

The other group members are named Silvia, Leshlye, Estela, María Guadalupe, Nora Angélica, Reyna and Josefina. They will invest in their businesses in a stationery store, to buy supplies to sell Mexican snacks, to buy used clothes to be sold, to buy cosmetics and shoes by catalog, and to buy corn and various other supplies to make tortillas.

loans.use: to buy original men's and women's perfumes

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 40-year-old, married man who has five children. They live in a poor area in Sana'a, Yemen. He is a hardworking and kindly man who strives to provide for his family. He is a teacher earning a low salary which is not enough to cover his family's expenses. He suffers a financial challenge, because he doesn't have a second source of income besides his salary. Sometimes, his children are forced to stay at home and not go to school, because they have nothing for daily expenses like transportation and food to attend school.

Mohammed decided to buy home appliances for his house. So, he applied for a loan of 349,999 Yemeni rials from AMB. He hopes to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to buy home appliances for his house.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 41 years old.  She is married and has three children.

She earns a living by operating a fishing business in the Philippines.  Rosemarie is borrowing 27,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy materials like wood, nails and paint necessary for the maintenance of her pump boat, an outrigger canoe powered by a small engine.  Rosemarie has been in this business for six years and she earns additional income from a general store.  She is working tirelessly to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials like wood, nails and paint necessary for the maintenance of her pump boat.

loans.name: Dragana

texts.en:
Dragana is 35 years old.  She is married and lives in a minority community in the southern part of Kosovo.  She has two children between the ages of 8 and 13 years old and both of them currently attend school.  Her husband works as guard in a primary school. 

Dragana owns agricultural land.  She works in an agricultural business based on family tradition.  Dragana is a hardworking woman and she works a lot to earn a living.  She has always worked by planting and growing wheat and corn, which she sells.  Dragana is in need of loan to pay for a new tractor.  The loan will enable her to continue to work the land and to reduce costs.  

In the future, Dragana hopes to secure a better education for her children.  She is very thankful to all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: to buy new tractor.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Emprendedoras  está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra.  Maria es una de las integrantes, ella es de una zona muy alejada del centro mismo de la ciudad donde tiene su pequeño negocio de venta de comestibles, la cual  sale también a vender en otros lugares sus productos. Desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de la ayuda de todas las personas de su zona puedan ir mejorando su entorno y así ofrecer una mayor seguridad a sus familias, también poder procurar para ellos un mejor futuro.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de ingredientes para sus comidas, como ser carne, verduras, condimentos y demás, y de esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia y deleitar a sus clientes con las delicias que hace. También así poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
Mujeres Emprendedoras (Enterprising Women) is a group working their first cycle of the women Committee’s program. They come from Concepción, a town that is still expanding and which is located a bit far from the central area of the country. This area is difficult to reach, and the members of this group want to fight to keep on progressing and to help improving the area where they live providing a better environment and making it grow little by little.
Maria is a member of this group. She lives in an area located very far away from the town center, which is where her small food shop is located. She also goes selling her products to other areas. She wants her area to improve in due time and with the help of every member of her community, in order to grant better security to their families as well as to succeed in granting them a better future.
She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients for her meals, such as meat, vegetables, dressings and more, in order to keep on helping her family as well as delighting her customer with the tasty food she prepares. She also wants to progress with her activity, thus providing her family with what they need to suffer no hardship in life.

loans.use: To buy meat, vegetables and dressings.

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en: Ligaya is a 37-year-old married woman and the mother of three children from Bohol, Philippines. She runs a store selling various dry goods to the people in her place. Ligaya wants to expand her business but lacks the capital to do so. Ligaya is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like clothes, slippers, kitchen utensils and plastic wares. In this way, she will be able to improve her stock and sell more materials to her customers. In the future, Ligaya dreams of making her business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like clothes, slippers, kitchen utensils and plastic wares

loans.name: Yonatan

texts.es: Yonatan de 20 años, es un joven trabajador y luchador. Vive junto a su madre en una casa alquilada desde hace 5 años.Como buen hombre del campo aprendió todo lo necesario al cuidado y crianza de animales de granja. Su principal dedicación desde niño fue mantenerlos saludables y en buen estado. Esto le sirvió para que desde hace un año emprendiera por si solo el negocio que sus familiares le enseñaron, la compra y venta de carne. Comenta que los días de feria ganadera , se alista para poder comprar los mejores ejemplares para asi poder vender sus carnes.Yonatan comercializa la carne tres veces por semana entre los vendedores del mercado, donde le pagan muy bien. Ahora desea ampliar sus conocimientos pues como joven emprendedor desea abrir su propia carnicería.Éste es su primer crédito con KIVA y agradece al apoyo el apoyo financiero que recibe para lograr sus objetivos , además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Yonatan, invertirá los S/. 500 soles en la compra de vaca y otros animales de granja para así abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Yonatan, age 20, is a hard-working and tenacious young man.  He lives with his mother in a house they have rented for five years.  As a good man from the field, he learned all that is necessary about caring and raising farm animals.  Ever since he was a boy, his main dedication was to keep them healthy and in good condition.  This served him in undertaking, one year ago, the business that his family taught him, buying and selling meat.

He says that on the days of the livestock fair he gets ready to be able to buy the best specimens in order to be able to sell their meat.  Yonatan sells the meat three times a week among the market sellers, where they pay him very well.

He now wishes to expand his knowledge.  As an enterprising young man, he wishes to own his own butcher shop.  This is his first loan with Kiva.  He is grateful for the financial support he gets in order to be able to achieve his objectives.  He pledges to be punctual with his payments.  Yonatan will invest the 500 soles in the purchase of beef and other farm animals in order to stock his business.

loans.use: to buy beef and other farm animals.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en casa de un familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo es de calidad, a precios accesibles, desea acrecentar su negocio pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar mas ropa pantalones, camisas, faldas, blusas, ropa para niños, etc. La clienta asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The client lives with her husband and her children in a home of a relative. She has worked in her business selling clothing for several years and this has given her lots of experience that has allowed her to earn better income. Her business is located in the market that is close to her residence. She has a lot of clients because people know that her products are high quality at affordable prices. She wants to grow her business, but she does not have sufficient capital. For this reason she is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy clothing such as pants, shirts, skirts, blouses, and children’s clothing.  The client assures that she will relieve herself of the debt and at the same time she has hopes for economic security of her household.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, pants and shirts, etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is the sole owner of Best Shears Inc., a barber shop and beauty salon supplier of shears, scissors, dryers and other small appliances for the hair salon industry. Mohammad is originally from Pakistan where he and his son-in-law have a small factory that produces shears and scissors. 
 
In 2005 he incorporated Best Shears Inc. and started distributing shears and scissors to barber shops. Originally the business intended to exclusively distribute shears and scissors made in their Pakistani factory, however, the company has expanded beyond their own factory to include products made in other factories. 

In 2010, the business generated $100,000 in sales. For the past two years, Mohammad has been analyzing the possibility of opening a store front. Under his current model, Mohammad’s business is home-based. Having a store front will allow Mohammad to offer a greater selection to his clients as well as be able to sharpen blades on-site, which is a service he would like to provide in the future.

loans.use: to pay the security deposit and two months' rent for a store front in Langley Park, Maryland where his business will be located.

loans.name: Wilson Geovanny

texts.es:
WILSON tiene 20 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Chimbo provincia de Bolívar.

Wilson se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, trigo, cebada. Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insecticidas, semillas, urea. 
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes. El sueño es tener una casa con patio grande. En el tiempo libre le gusta compartir con la familia.
texts.en:
Wilson, age 20, is single and does not have any children.  He lives with his parents in Chimbo in the Bolívar province.

Wilson grows corn, wheat, and barley.  He is requesting the loan to buy fertilizers, insecticides, seeds, and urea.  With the help of the loan he will be able to buy the fertilizers.

His dream is to have a house with a large patio.  In his free time he likes to share with the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, seeds, and urea.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive en casa propia con su familia, el tiene una pequeña discoteca desde hace 8 años tiene mucha clientela pues lo buscan para amenizar cumpleaños, bodas, quince años, etc. Con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logar solventar los gastos de su hogar, el cliente solicita un crédito para poder comprar respuestos para arreglar el equipo de sonido que ocupa en su trabajo ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para cubrir eso gastos y esa es su única fuente de trabajo y  asi el seguira llevando lo necesario a su hogar.
texts.en:
The client lives in his own house with his family.  He has had a small disco for eight years and has a lot of clients.  People seek him out to liven up birthdays, weddings, coming-of-age parties, etc.  With the profits that he obtains from work, he covers the home expenses.

He requests a loan in order to be able to buy replacement parts to fix the sound equipment he uses in his work.  With the money he makes working, he does not have enough to cover these expenses.  This is his only source of work.  In doing this, he will be able to continue bringing what is necessary to his home.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts for his sound equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijas, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene 6  años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, esta ubicada en el lugar de su residencia en una localidad, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda, asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This borrower lives with her husband and two daughters. She has a store from which she sells basic necessities, including beans, milk, eggs and bread, among others. She has been working at this business for six years, which has given her experience in sales and has allowed her to improve her profits.

Her store is located in her home, which is in a town where she is well known among her neighbors and where she has gained many customers. Her store is stocked, but she would like to grow her business by making another investment in it. For this she needs capital, and it is for this reason that she is requesting this loan to buy sugar, coffee, basic grains, candies and other items she needs. She promises to pay off the loan, and she says she is confident that she will be able to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sugar, coffee, basic grains, candies and other items for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa de su madre con su esposo y dos hijas, tiene un negocio de venta de pupusas y hamburguesas desde hace varios años su negocio lo tiene ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos que tiene en su hogar, La clienta solicita un crédito para poder comprar todo lo necesario como: maíz, chicharrón, frijoles, quesillo, carne, pan para hamburguesa, mayonesa, mostaza, etc. para elaborar las pupusas y hamburguesas y asi  obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesita.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in her mother's house with her husband and her 2 daughters.  She's had a business selling pupusas (traditional dish made from thick corn tortillas) and hamburgers for a number of years.  Her business is located near her house.  With the earnings she makes from her sales, she manages to cover some of the household expenses.  

This borrower is requesting a loan to buy supplies that she needs for her business, such as: corn, pork rinds, beans, cheese, meat, hamburger buns, mayonnaise, mustard, etc.  This way she can make her pupusas and hamburgers and thereby obtain better earnings so that she can provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy corn, pork rinds, beans, cheese, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente es una persona muy trabajadora, honrada y honesta,  el tiene un taller industrial se dedica hacer puertas, balcones, barandas, etc desde hace varios años con las ganancias que obtienen de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo. El cliente  solicita un crédito para poder comprar los materiales necesarios como hierro, laminas, y todo lo necesario para poder realizar su trabajo y asi seguir llevando el pan diario a su familia.
texts.en:
This borrower is a very hardworking, respectable, and honest person. He has an industrial workshop and he has been making doors, balconies, railings, etc. for several years. With the earnings from his work, he manages to cover some of his household expenses. He lives in his own house with his wife and son. 

He is applying for a loan to buy necessary materials such as iron, aluminum sheets, and everything he needs to carry out his work. He will then be able to continue bringing the daily bread home to his family.

loans.use: to buy iron, aluminum sheets, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive con sus padres, ella posee una tienda desde hace 3 años, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda a sus padres en los gastos de la casa ella vende artículos de primera necesidad como granos básicos, aceite, azúcar, café, etc. Tiene mucha clientela pues vende a buen precio toda su mercadería y es una persona muy amable con sus clientes.  La clienta solicita un crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería y surtir su tienda para tener a sus clientes satisfechos a la hora que lleguen a comprar y asi ella obtendrá mejores ganancias y seguirá ayudando a sus padres como siempre lo ha hecho
texts.en:
The borrower lives with her parents and has owned a shop for the past three years. With the profits from her business she helps her parents with the household expenses.

She sells essential goods such as basic grains, oil, sugar, coffee etc. She has a lot of customers because she sells at a good price and is very kind to her customers.

The borrower is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise so she can stock her store and have more satisfied clients at the time of purchase. This way she will make a higher profit and can carry on helping her parents as she has always has done.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, sweets, oil, sugar etc

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos, la clienta posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos de primera necesidad como: pan, leche, huevos, alimentos enlatados, agua embotellada, verduras y otros productos más. Ella es una persona muy responsable y amable la cual cuenta con varios clientes a pesar que su tienda no tiene mucha variedad de productos. la clienta solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de productos, ya que el mayor deseo de ella es el de poder surtir su negocio y así percibir mayores ganancias. ella es una mujer muy responsable con su familia y desea mucho poder brindarle todo lo mejor.
texts.en: This member lives in her own house with her husband and two children.  She has a shop where she sells basic, staple goods, including bread, milk, eggs, tinned goods, bottled water and vegetables.  This member is very responsible and friendly.  She has many customers even though she does not have a huge variety of products.  This member is applying for a loan so that she has the necessary money to buy a greater quantity of products.  Her biggest wish is to stock up her shop better and so earn a higher income.  This member is very responsible with her family and she wants to provide them with the best she can.

loans.use: to buy sweets, drinks and basic grains.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa de un familiar con sus padres y su hija de 1 año de edad, ella vende perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, etc. en las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos que tiene y ayuda a sus padres en los gastos de la casa, la clienta solicita un crédito para poder compra mas mercadería y surtir con diferentes productos su negocio para satisfacer a sus clientes y asi obtener mejores ganancias para tener con su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in a family house with her parents and her one-year-old daughter. She sells perfumes, creams, deodorants, etc. in various neighborhoods close to her home. With her earnings, she manages to cover her own expenses and help her parents with the household expenses. 

She has applied for a loan to buy more merchandise and stock her business with different products to satisfy her clients. She will then earn a better income to have better financial stability along with her family.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, deodorants, lotions, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive con su madre y sus dos hijos es madre soltera, ella tiene una pequeña tienda en la que vende Productos perecederos como refrescos, golosinas, dulce y otras serie de artículos comestibles y no comestibles; a través de  este comercio ha sacado adelante a su familia. Ella busca mejorar su calidad  de  vida,  por lo que solicita un crédito para incrementar la variedad de sus  artículos en su tienda, como: granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, etc.  lo que le permitiría incrementar las ganancias de  su negocio y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su grupo familiar
texts.en: The client lives with her mother and her two children. She is a single mother. She has a small store where she sells perishable products, such as sodas, candy, other foodstuffs, and other items. Through this business her family has managed to get ahead. She wants to improve her quality of life, which is why she is requesting a loan in order to increase the variety of items in her store by buying staple grains, sodas, candy, etc. This will enable her to increase the profits from her business and improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase staple grains, oil, candy, sodas, etc

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia con su madre, su esposo y su hijo, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
The borrower lives with her mother, husband and son in a house they own. She is well known locally because she is a generous person, committed to her work. She has always stood proud and has got ahead despite the difficulties. With effort and dedication, she opened a store where she sells staple products such as grains, milk, eggs and rice.

She is committed to her work and serves her customers very well, and this is why they come to her and prefer her products. She needs to stock her store now that the demand is increasing and she lacks the capital to do so. This is why she is requesting a loan to buy more products such as grains, instant food products, sweets, beverages, etc. She believes that God will make sure she gets the support she needs and that she will only have to worry about bringing food to her family's table.

loans.use: to buy grains, instant food products, sweets and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente es un hombre responsable y trabajador, vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus padres, actualmente se dedica a la venta de arreglos florales en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, tiene ya varios años de dedicarse a la venta y le parece un negocio rentable y con mucha productividad, el cliente solicita un credito para la compra de materiales como: flores de toda clase, palmas, listones, canastas, etc y obtener una mejor ganancia para seguir ayudando en los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
The client is a responsible and hard-working man. He lives in his own home with his wife and his parents. Currently he works selling flower arrangements in the market that is near their home. 

He has been selling for several years now, and it seems to be a profitable business, and very productive. The client is requesting a loan so that he can buy supplies such as: flowers of all kinds, palm leaves, ribbons, baskets, etc., and get better earnings so that he can continue helping with their household expenses.

loans.use: To buy florist materials such as palm leaves, ribbons, baskets, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase perfumes, creams, lotions, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta es una persona muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, se dedica a la venta de zapatos y ropa en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunas necesidades que a diario se le presentan en su hogar, según lo mencionado el negocio es rentable y genera buenas ganancias, la clienta solicita un credito para la compra de mercadería zapatos para damas, caballeros y niños, blusas, pantalones, camisas etc. para engrandecer el negocio y así poder tener mejores ganancias y de igual manera una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
The client is a very hard-working person with a great desire to succeed. She lives in her own house with her husband and son, and sells clothing and shoes in the market which is near their home. 

With the earnings from her sales and with her husband's help, they manage to cover some of the daily needs that arise in their household. According to the client, the business is profitable and generates good earnings. 

The client is requesting a loan so that she can buy merchandise such as women's, men's, and children shoes, as well as blouses, pants, shirts, etc. This is in order to expand the business, have better earnings, and this way have better financial stability.

loans.use: To buy clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente vive junto a su esposa en casa propia, es un hombre muy responsable quien siempre está en miras de mejorar su estabilidad económica. El trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan francés, en horas de la madrugada para poder venderlo antes del desayuno, que es cuando las personas más lo consumen al igual que en la cena. El solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para contar con la ayuda necesaria para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura, manteca, latas para hornear y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para el, puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: The client lives with his wife in his own home. He is a very responsible man who is always looking to improve his economic stability. He works in his own bakery where he makes French bread in the early hours of the morning in order to be ready to sell before breakfast, which is when people most consume it, as well as for supper time. He is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can have the necessary help to invest in the purchase of flour, yeast, butter, baking tins, and everything necessary to produce more. This improvement project for his bakery is very important for him, since this is the way he will improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, baking tins, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz, frijol y yuca, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa de sus padres, con sus dos hermanos los cuales le ayudan a trabajar en la agricultura, cuando pasa la temporada agrícola el cliente se dedica a trabajar en construcción, el esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y asi poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando el los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en: The client has made a living from agriculture for several years and this has given him the ability and the necessary knowledge to attend to his crops. His main crops are corn, beans, and cassava. He sells his crops through wholesalers of staple crops located close to his place of residence. With the profits he obtains from his sales he helps with the expenses his family has. He lives in his parents’ home with his two siblings, who help him with his agricultural work. When the growing season is over the client makes a living from construction. He is requesting a loan in order to be able to purchase agricultural supplies which will help him to plant his crops, such as compost, seeds, and fertilizer. With these he will be able to have better profits and continue to help with the household expenses without any limitations.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizer, seeds, pesticide, etc

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, canchos para el cabello, ropa para damas y caballeros, ropa interior entre otras cosas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en un mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y  logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su familia, la clienta desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicita un credito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario como: perfumes, esmaltes para uñas, desodorantes y tambien desea comprar ropa interior para damas y caballeros ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solicitada ella podra obtener mejores ganancias y asi seguira dandole a su familia lo que necesita sin limitacion alguna
texts.en: The client sells all kinds of personal use products such as lotions, deodorants, hair clips, women's and men's clothing, and underwear. Her business is located in a market near to her home. With her income, she is able to cover her household costs. She lives in her own home with her family. She wants to expand her business, so she is requesting a loan that will allow her to buy everything necessary such as perfumes, nail polish, and deodorant, as well as underwear for men and women. She has a lot of clientele because of her accessible prices. With the support of this loan, she will be able to obtain greater income and continue providing her family everything necessary without limits.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, underwear, perfume, shampoo, cream, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo de 1 año de edad, ella se dedica a la venta y elaboracion de cepillos para lavar ropa desde hace 3 años, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar, la clienta solicita un credito para poder comprar los materiales que necesita para la elaboracion de los cepillos como: cerdas de colores, madera y pegamento ya que tiene mucha clientela pues es un producto muy vendible, y asi ella pueda tener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: The client lives in her own home with her husband and one-year-old child. She has made and sold brushes for washing clothing for three years. With her income and her husband's help, she and her husband are able to cover their household costs. The client is requesting a loan for the purchase of the necessary materials for making her brushes, such as coloured bristles, wood, and adhesive. She has many customers because this is a very sellable product. With this investment, she will be able to have a better income and provide her family with greater economic stability.

loans.use: to buy coloured bristles, wood, and adhesive.

loans.name: Camila

texts.es: Camila de 61 años de edad , es soltera y vive acompañada de sus dos hijos en la casa que sus padres le heredaron.Camila se dedica al comercio, vende sus aguajes y sus helados de fruta en la vereda de su casa, lleva 30 años dedicándose a esta actividad, se inició buscando mejoras para su hogar por la necesidad de generar sus propios ingresos ya que no contaba con el apoyo del padre de sus hijos y gracias a su fortaleza salió adelante por ella misma , con este trabajo educó y crio a sus hijos. Al principio se le presentaron muchas dificultades económicas por que no contaba con el capital para empezar con su negocio, luego tuvo una enfermedad que la dejo postrada en una silla de ruedas, pero aun así nada ha podido derrumbar la fortaleza que tiene Camila por lo que ella sigue trabajando como puede.Este es el primer crédito con Kiva, por lo que está muy agradecida por el apoyo económico recibido, ya que le dará el capital suficiente para mejorar su negocio.Con el monto solicitado de S/1500 soles comprará aguaje , fruta fresca , hielo y otros productos que necesita para su negocio,.
texts.en: Camila is 61 years old, she is single and she lives together with her two children in the house she has inherited from her parents. Camila is a retailer, selling “aguajes” (regional fruit) and fruit ice-creams in the street outside her house. She has been engaging in this activity for 30 years: she started it looking for a way to improve her family’s’ conditions, needing to earn her own living as she could not count on support from the father of her children. Thanks to her strength she has succeeded in getting ahead on her own, and thanks to this job she has succeeded in educating and raising her children. At first she met many economic challenges, as she did not have the initial working capital to start her activity; them she got sick and was forced to live on a wheelchair, but not event this has been enough to knock Camila’s strength down, and she keeps on working as much as she can. This is her first loan with Kiva, and she is really grateful for the economic support she has received, as this will provide her with the capital she needs to improve her activity. The loan of 1500 PEN she is requesting will be used to buy aguajes, fresh fruit, ice and other products she needs for her activity.

loans.use: To buy aguajes, fresh fruits and ice.

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
"La nueva esperanza" es el nombre de un grupo integrado por 9 personas, cada una de ellas desarrolla una actividad económica con el objetivo de sacar adelante a sus familias y darle una mejor calidad de vida.

Olga Lidia es uno de los integrantes de este grupo, ella tiene la edad de 47 años, solo estudió la primaria y esta casada con Facundo que se dedica a la albañilería, ellos tienen un hijo de nombre Fernando que estudia la primaria.

Lidia platica que siempre ha sido una mujer muy trabajadora y busca la manera de ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, pero fue hace 6 años que llegaron a vivir a esta colonia y vio que no había tiendas, tenían que caminar mucho cuando necesitaban comprar, así que decidió poner una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su hogar para ganar su propio dinero y brindar el servicio a sus vecinos.

Un crédito de VisionFund le ayudará a comprar galletas, dulces, refrescos, café, huevos, saborizantes, papel higiénico, arroz, frijol, jabón y  aceite para resurtir su negocio.

Ella espera a futuro poder construir un local en el frente de su casa para ahí poner su tienda.

Los demás integrantes del grupo son:

Virginia venta de platanos,
Maritzabel venta de zapatos,
Nayeli Yolet venta de pescado,
Santa Aurelia cria de ganado,
Maria del Carmen venta de cosmeticos,
Lina venta de cosmeticos, 
Seni Rocio venta de abarrotes, 
Maricela venta de perfumeria.
texts.en:
‘La Nueva Esperanza’ [The New Hope] is the name of the group comprised of nine members.  Each one of them works at a business activity with the objective of getting their families ahead and giving them a better quality of life.

Olga Lidia is one of the members of this group.  She is 47 years old.  She only attended elementary school.  She is married to Facundo, a bricklayer.  They have one child, Fernando, who goes to elementary school.

She tells us that she has always been a hard-working woman who looks for a way to help her husband with the household expenses.  They came to live in this neighborhood six years ago, and she saw that there were no stores.  They had to walk a lot when they needed to makes purchases.  That is how she decided to set up a small grocery store in her home in order to earn her own money and provide service to her neighbors.

A loan from VisionFund will help her to buy cookies, sweets, soft drinks, coffee, eggs, flavorings, toilet paper, rice, beans, soap, and cooking oil in order to restock her business.  In the future she hopes to be able to build a place in front of her house to set up her store.

The other members of the group are:

Virginia sells bananas,
Maritzabel sells shoes,
Nayeli Yolet sells fish,
Santa Aurelia raises livestock,
Maria del Carmen sells cosmetics,
Lina sells cosmetics,
Seni Rocio sells groceries,
Maricela sells perfume.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to restock her grocery store.

loans.name: Fausto

texts.es:
Fausto tiene 49 años de edad, esta casado y tiene tres hijas de 20, 18 y 16 años de edad respectivamente. Él es una persona muy conocida en la comunidad, que esta ubicada en unos cerros lejos de la ciudad. Durante años trabajo junto a su padre en labores agrícolas y en la herrería (fabricación de Cumas, machetes, barras, entre otros). Empezó a los 14 años de edad a fabricar estas herramientas que utiliza la gente campesina para trabajar la tierra. En un inicio el  trabajo lo hacían junto a tres personas; hoy en día lo hace entre dos. También, trabaja en la agricultura, siembra 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz. A los 19 años don Fausto emigro a los Estados Unidos a trabajar en la construcción, regreso al país a los 23 años de edad, posteriormente se volvió a ir para el extranjero y regreso a los 27 años de edad, para entonces ya había comprado un terreno y construido su casa. 

Se levanta a las 3:00 a.m. a fabricar 16 Cumas hasta las 9:00 a.m., luego se traslada al terreno en donde cultiva a preparar la tierra. El hierro y el carbón, que es la materia prima para fabricar las cumas y machetes las adquiere en el pueblo cada 22 días según sea la demanda y paga transporte para efectuar las compras, este proceso es igual para comprar los insumos agrícolas.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar abono, pago de mano de obra para limpiar el terreno en donde cultivara 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz y el resto lo utilizara para comprar hierro y carbón para fabricar las cumas y machetes, ya que ene este momento tiene gran demanda.  Con la inversión podrá obtener una cosecha buena que le servirá para la alimentación de su familia y al fabricar más cumas y machetes recibirá más ingresos, estas las vende en su casa y a veces las sale a vender a la plaza del pueblo. Él desea mejorar su casa y brindar el estudio a sus hijas, ya que él solo estudio hasta el quinto grado.
texts.en:
Fausto, 49, is married and has three daughters, ages 16, 18, and 20. He is very well-known in his community, which is located in the hills far from the city. For years, he worked alongside his father on the farm and in the blacksmith shop (making curved knives, machetes, and bars, among others). He started making these tools, which farmers use to work the land, at the age of 14. At the beginning, they worked along with three other people; now there are two. He also works in agriculture, farming 10,500 square meters of corn. At the age of 19, Fausto emigrated to the United States to work in construction. He returned to his country at the age of 23. Later, he once again moved abroad and returned when he was 27. By then, he had already bought a plot of land and built his house.

He wakes up at 3:00 a.m. to make sixteen curved knives before 9:00 a.m. Afterwards, he moves to the farm where he plants his crops in order to prepare the land. He buys iron and coal, the raw materials with which he makes knives and machetes, every 22 days in town, depending on the demand. He pays for transport to make these purchases. The process is the same when he buys farm supplies.

He is applying for a loan from Fundación Campo to buy fertilizer and to pay for workers to clear the land where he will cultivate 10,500 meters of corn. He will use the rest to buy iron and coal to make curved knives and machetes, because they are currently in great demand. With this investment, he will be able to obtain a good harvest which will help him to feed his family. By making more curved knives and machetes, he will receive greater earnings. He sells them in his house, and he sometimes goes out to make sales in the town plaza. He would like to improve his home and give his children an education, because he only studied up until the fifth grade.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, to pay workers to clear the land where he will cultivate 10,500 square meters of corn, and to buy iron and coal to make curved knives and machetes, as they are currently in great demand.

loans.name: Salah

texts.en:
Salah is from Iraq. He is 56 years old, married and has two children. Together, Salah and his wife provide the family income.

Salah is a grocer and has a small grocery store. He provides all the basic needs of a family, like dairy products, snacks, drinks and detergents. He established his business in 2008 and has gained good experience in this field. He has an excellent reputation in his neighborhood.

Salah is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD. The aim of this loan is to pay the annual rent on his grocery store and to buy a motor generator. Salah aims to grow his business and increase his profits so that one day he may open a big supermarket and provide his children a successful career.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of his grocery store and to buy a motor generator.

loans.name: Loi

texts.en:
Born in 1962, Loi has three daughters with their own families and a son who is learning in primary school. Her husband makes corrugated aluminum to earn a living. Loi, a laborer for three years, has a monthly income of about 3,000,000 VND.

Loi has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2005. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,810,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan request, she would like to borrow 10,682,000 VND to buy aluminum to make corrugated aluminum with her husband. Her goals are the security of her family and more money for the business.

loans.use: to buy aluminum to make corrugated aluminum with her husband.

loans.name: Tailoring Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are members of the Tailoring Group from Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. These young gentlemen are tailors who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, in order to apply for a loan of SLL 500,000 for each in the group. With this loan, they will be able to expand their tailoring business, attract more customers, make a better profit and consequently improve on their living conditions.
 
The featured leader of this group of tailors is Amara. He was born in the city of Kenema 54 years ago. He is married and has six children. His wife is a businesswoman and five of his children are attending primary and secondary schools. The last is not of school-going age. Amara has been a professional tailor for many years now. He has requested this loan in order to buy tailoring materials like cloth, thread, pauplin, and related items in order to sew a large quantity of clothes for sale.

loans.use: to buy tailoring materials like cloth, thread, pauplin, and other items in order to sew a large quantity of clothes for sale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like rice, fish, tomatoes, onions, peppers and more in large quantities in order to stop buying these items at retail price

loans.name: Larissa

texts.es:
La Sra. Larissa es de la ciudad de Pilar, ella es peluquera tiene un hermoso salón de belleza con ambiente climatizado donde realiza cortes para dama caballero y niños y todo lo referente a la estética femenina.
Esta acompañada, su pareja es chofer de colectivo de una empresa que realiza viajes diarios a la capital del país, son una pareja joven y muy emprendedora, viven en casa propia no tienen hijos aún  pero en muy poco tiempo nacerá el primer integrante de la familia ya que Larissa está en la dulce espera. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora, que lucha por salir adelante. 
Solicita este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su salón, como ser tintes, tijeras, shampoo, enjuagues, gel, spray y demás. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Larissa come from the town of Pilar. She is a hairdresser and she owns a charming, air-conditioned beauty salon where she offers haircuts for women, men and children alike, as well as everything related to female beauty.
She has lifetime partner and her partner provides public transportation services for a company that offers daily journeys to the country’s capital. They are a very young and resourceful couple, they live in a house of their own and they have no children yet, but the first member of their family will be born in a short while, as Larissa is pregnant. She is a very hardworking person who strives to progress in life.
She is requesting a loan to invest it in the purchase of supplies for her salon, such as dyes, scissors, shampoo, mouthwash, gel, sprays and more. She is grateful for the chance she is being granted, as it will be very helpful for her.

loans.use: To buy dyes, scissors, shampoo, mouthwash, gel and sprays.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy perfumes from the catalog to increase inventory

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es: Con su credikiva anterior Sandra mejoró la infraestructura de su consultorio y este beneficio se vio reflejado en nuevos pacientes. Ella quiere que sus financiadores de Kiva  conozcan su actividad mediante el siguiente mensaje: “Soy prestadora de los servicios de salud, en el área de la odontología, con voluntad y deseos e regalar sonrisas” En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva para comprar el instrumental de ortodoncia y odontológico, su inversión planea ser exitosa porque Sandra prestará un nuevo servicio a los pacientes que lo necesitan .
texts.en:
With her previous credikiva loan, Sandra improved the infrastructure of her dental office and this advantage was reflected in her acquiring new patients. 

She wants her Kiva investors to know her business through the following message: "I provide health services in the area of dentistry, with the will and desire to give the gift of smiles." 

Now she is applying for a new credikiva loan so that she can buy a set of dental and orthodontic instruments. Sandra intends her investment to be successful, because she will provide a new service to patients who need it.

loans.use: to buy a set of dental and orthodontic instruments

loans.name: Donis Francisco

texts.es:
Donis es originario de Santa Rosa, una pequeña comarca es las afuera de Estelí, es casado tiene cuatro hijos con las siguientes edades: 13, 12, 8, y 2 años, de los cuales tres están en la escuela. Inicio sus actividades en el cultivo de café hace 10 años, cuando su madre le heredo un terreno de tres manzanas cultivadas de café, a la edad de 28 años, desde entonces ha venido cultivando y cosechando café, obteniendo ingresos con los cuales compro más terreno para ampliar el área de siembra. Él se dedica también a la siembra de maíz, frijol, tomate y chiltoma En estas actividades lo apoya su esposa. El producto lo comercializa en la localidad a comerciantes ambulantes. Tiene otros ingresos, los que comparte su esposa del negocio de una pequeña pulpería. Le gustaría comercializar su producto en la capital Managua, porque ahí pagan a un mejor precio los productos; café, maíz. Frijol, tomate y chiltoma. Las expectativas que tiene para su negocio, son: Obtener buenos rendimientos en sus cultivos y obtener buen precio de comercialización.
